## R Markdown

```{r load the data}
Fcast_MRP <- read.csv('HDD_FY19_MRP.csv')
CFG <- read.csv('CFG.csv')
names(CFG)[2]<-"CFG"
```

```{r Match CFG names}
Fcast_CFG <- levels(Fcast_MRP$CFG)
Fcast_MRP %>% group_by(CFG) %>% summarise(TotalFcast=sum(value)) -> Fcast_MRP.simplified

Fcast_MRP.simplified %>% full_join(CFG) -> CFG_fcast.joined
# no joined results because they have different names for the same CFG

# remove _CFG for MRP
Fcast_MRP.simplified$CFG = substr(Fcast_MRP.simplified$CFG,1,nchar(as.character(Fcast_MRP.simplified$CFG))-4)

# join again
Fcast_MRP.simplified %>% full_join(CFG) -> CFG_fcast.joined
```
